mapper.insert: insert into jumei.jm_bt_sku_import ( channel_id, product_code, deal_id, sku, upc_code, abroad_price, deal_price, market_price, size, created, creater, modified, modifier) values ( #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upcCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abroadPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{dealPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{marketPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE upc_code = #{upcCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, abroad_price = #{abroadPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, deal_price = #{dealPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, market_price = #{marketPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, size = #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modified = now(), modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update jumei.jm_bt_product_import product, (SELECT sku.channel_id, sku.product_code, sku.deal_id from jumei.jm_bt_sku_import sku where sku.channel_id = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and sku.creater != sku.modified and sku.deal_id = #{dealId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY sku.channel_id, sku.product_code, sku.deal_id) skum set product.syn_flg = if(product.syn_flg = '2', '1', product.syn_flg), product.modified = now(), product.modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where product.channel_id = skum.channel_id and product.product_code = skum.product_code and product.deal_id = skum.deal_id
